## RouteMatch interface

Result object returned by a routing operation and event value for [EVENT\_ROUTE\_CHANGED](./router.event_route_changed.md)<!-- -->. Contains the matched route ID and any route params.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RouteMatch extends IID<string> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [params](./router.routematch.params.md) | <code>any</code> | Matched &amp; processed route params. |
|  [title](./router.routematch.title.md) | <code>string</code> |  |
